                                                   int port,

        port - is the port number
        dbName - is the Database Name
        username - user name
        password - password

      • setDatabase

        public static DBConnector setDatabase(DriverResolver.DatabaseType dbType,
                                      java.util.Properties dbProperties)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        For SEQUEL databases like Oracle, MS SQLServer, MYSQL provide required DB Credentials to establish connection.
        Parameters:
        dbType - is the ENUM value of type DatabaseType. Select the type of the DB .
        dbProperties - is the Properties file that must be having DB_URL, USERNAME and PASSWORD as keys with respective values
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setDatabase

        public static DBConnector setDatabase(DriverResolver.DatabaseType dbType,
                                      java.lang.String url,
                                      java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Purpose: To establish connection with Database and provide all the services to make basic CRUD operations
        Parameters:
        db - is the DatabaseType ENUM type which has values ORACLE, MYSQL, SQLSERVER that identifies the Database type
        url - is the Datbase URL to establish connection
        username - is the username
        password - is the password
        Returns:
        DBConnector object which has access to all the services for CRUD Operations
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
